overview: This action comedy is about an awkward movie star, Angel (Debbie Goh) who accidentally becomes a Triad leader in an intense election war among 4 main Triads in Petaling Street. Media makes a lot of coverage of this new Triad leader, exposing her for assassination. While she tries to hide from her assassin, she bumps into a restaurant owner Xie Da Xiang (Chen Han Wei) who is her ex-boyfriend...
title: Bullets Over Petaling Street
